description: This file provides implementation of the basic container object functions for a Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) Obj Entity Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization routines.

classes.name: SLAP_OBJ_ENTITY_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object representing a SLAP Object Entity with membership variables for object descriptors, tables, interface pointers, synchronization locks, and methods related to SLAP Object management.

classes.name: SLAP_OLA_INTERFACE
classes.description: Interface structure for SLAP Object Lifecycle API, containing interface identifiers, context, name, and function pointers for object property and method descriptor retrieval.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapOeoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new SLAP Object Entity object, setting up basic properties and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOeoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and releases resources associated with a specific SLAP Object Entity instance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOeoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Allocates and assigns the SLAP Object Lifecycle Interface, and sets its name and ID.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOeoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs detailed initialization of an SLAP Object Entity, setting up member variables, locks, tables, and function pointers.
